name: DependencyCheck
description: Dependency Check task for Azure Pipelines to identify vulnerable third-party components
author: esfadevops

inputs.name: enableVulnerabilityFilesMaintenance
inputs.label: Enable maintenance of vulnerability files in storage account
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to enable maintenance of vulnerability files in storage account.

inputs.name: writeStorageAccountContainerSasUri
inputs.label: Write Shared Access Signature Uri for storage account blob container
inputs.helpMarkDown: Write Shared Access Signature Uri for blob container of storage account to update the versioned vulnerability files: odc.mv.db and jsrepository.json

inputs.name: logAnalyticsWorkspaceKey
inputs.label: Shared Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: A Log Analytics workspace shared key

inputs.name: enableSelfHostedVulnerabilityFiles
inputs.label: Enable self hosted vulnerability files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to enable self hosted vulnerability files.

inputs.name: readStorageAccountContainerSasUri
inputs.label: Read Shared Access Signature Uri to download the database of vulnerabilities
inputs.helpMarkDown: Read Shared Access Signature Uri for for blob container of storage account to download the versioned vulnerability files: odc.mv.db and jsrepository.json

inputs.name: excludedScanPathPatterns
inputs.label: Excluded scan path patterns
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path patterns to exclude from scan for vulnerabiities

inputs.name: severityThreshold
inputs.label: Severity threshold score for vulnerabilities
inputs.helpMarkDown: The task will fail if vulerabilties are detected with a CVSSv2 or CVSSv2 score equal to or higher than the threshold set. Range: 0.1 to 10.0

inputs.name: dependencyCheckDashboardUrl
inputs.label: Dependency check dashboard URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Dependency check dashboard URL shown in task Warnings and Errors when vulnerabilities are detected
